{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:14.920
    | text      = Alex, Alex, you recall from Alex's shirt of the presidents, one of the things that was

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:30.240

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:34.559

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:35.559
    | text      = And it's because of Alex's favorite speech, the man in the arena speech.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:39.680
    | text      = And so now Alex bestows the highest honor upon Marjorie Taylor Greene.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:44.279
    | text      = He calls her a woman.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:45.279
    | text      = Don't do that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:46.640
    | text      = What was the journey running like for Congress and winning by record numbers and being demonized
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:51.160
    | text      = and attacked being the woman in the arena that Teddy Roosevelt talked about?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:55.140
    | text      = What has that process been like?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:56.279
    | text      = Because it seems like in the last three years it's made you stronger, not weaker.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:59.900
    | text      = So Roosevelt's speech was about the man in the arena and it's very specifically not about

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:03.640

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:05.079

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:08.759
    | text      = literally or metaphorically.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:11.160
    | text      = Teddy Roosevelt was president from 1901 to 1909 and women didn't have the right to vote
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:15.680
    | text      = until 1920, the ratification of the 19th amendment.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:19.519
    | text      = The first woman was elected to Congress in 1916 and Rebecca Felton was the first woman
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:39.599

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = slave owner to be in the Senate, so that sucks.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:48.640
    | text      = Yep.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:49.640
    | text      = I set out to talk about one depressing thing and it turns out we found another.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:55.240
    | text      = Well, I'm telling you, I'm starting to think that if you go back into America's history
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:00.279

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:00.060
    | text      = Another thing I was thinking about, though, when I was listening to this is how much of
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:02.340
    | text      = a boner Alex has for the idea that American government grew out of the Western British
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:06.819
    | text      = tradition and, you know, yells about the Magna Carta all the time.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:10.420
    | text      = Our tradition of voice votes in the House is a direct extension of how business was
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:14.340
    | text      = carried out in the House of Commons, and this carries over to governments in places like
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:18.500
    | text      = Canada and Australia as well.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:20.260
    | text      = It's a big part of our system.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:21.899
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:22.899
    | text      = Alex should be staunchly opposed to what Marjorie's suggesting because it's a radical departure
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:26.579
    | text      = from the tradition upon which the Founding Fathers built this country.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:31.100
    | text      = Here's some fun for you.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:32.220
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:33.220
    | text      = In 1801, Thomas Jefferson wrote a text called the Manual of Parliamentary Practice, which
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:37.800
    | text      = Marjorie is explicitly calling to upend.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:41.100
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:42.100
    | text      = From Jefferson's manual, quote, when the debate is ended, the speaker, holding the bill in
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:46.100
    | text      = his hand, puts the question for its passage by saying, gentlemen, all of you who are of
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:50.220
    | text      = the opinion that this bill shall pass say aye, and after the answer of ayes, all of
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:54.939
    | text      = those that contrary opinion say no.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:57.380
    | text      = The affirmative and negative of the question, having been both put and answered, the speaker
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:01.260
    | text      = declares whether the yeas or nays have it by the sound, if he be himself satisfied,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:07.159
    | text      = and it stands as the judgment of the House.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:09.939
    | text      = But if he be not himself satisfied, which voices the greater, or if before any other
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:15.739
    | text      = member comes in the House or before any new motion made, any member shall arise and declare
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:20.920
    | text      = himself dissatisfied with the speaker's decision.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:24.100
    | text      = If Alex had any understanding of the Founding Fathers he pretends he studied and idolizes,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:28.760
    | text      = he would probably kick Marjorie Taylor Greene out of the studio for daring to propose a
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:32.380
    | text      = bill that spits in the face of Thomas Jefferson's rules for how the House conducts business.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:37.220
    | text      = Ah.

    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:38.220
